Rodimus had been standing just outside the torture chamber not sure if
he wanted to actually enter it. there was something about this room
that gave him the chills, especially when he didn't need to go in
there.

Instead he just stood in the shadows, listening the words of the
others like Darkhawk, Scorponok and that Autobot Tuscon. there was
something about that Autobot that seemed to grate on his nerves. He
wasn't sure what it was, maybe it was his high sounding talk, maybe it
was his tenacity, maybe it was his . . . .

*SLAM!*

Rodimus was jolted out of his revelry by the doors slamming shut,
cutting him off from the torture chamber. Inside he could hear
threatening tones coming from Scorponok and Darkhawk, and the sound of
a vehicle's engine revving.

Rodimus' attention was diverted from further listening as a message
came over his comms, a text message from Perceptor.

> "Rodimus... Go to this sector and watch out that our enemies doesnt go inside" typed Perceptor fast and send the secret message "They mustnt get her... Do what ever you have to to stop them"

"Yes!" Rodimus jumped as he could see the urgency with the speed that
Perceptor was typing the message. "On my way!" he sent back as he
received the location from Perceptor.

Rodimus was surprised, as the location was only a short distance away.
With a thought he quickly shifted into his vehicle, gunned his motor
and moved swiftly. He figured the 'her' that Perceptor was referring
to was Nightlight. Nightlight was Rodimus' wife, he would not let
those idiot Maximals get their hands on her!

(TAG)

Preston
(Dark Rodimus)
